reviews.review: You have  to see it for yourself
It isn't a bad movie but I think it is very overrated.

Absolute Amazing! Stunning! Shocking! Astonishing! The prefect way to say goodbye to the last ten years and say hello to a new one! It's like playing a game of chess, Marvel had been carefully planning each step for this point, for this grand-finale! And the result is just awesome. Definitely going to watch it again! Can't wait for Avengers 4!

Not sure what all of the fuss is about.  It was pretty good for a superhero movie.  To many characters involved, most of them we already know.  Just an endless string of cameos.  The villain, Thanos, was the most interesting character.  It was well done and all but maybe i'm burnt out on superhero movies..
Lives up to the hype. and surpasses it 100 fold.

While not a mega Marvel geek, I have seen most of the movies preceding Infinity War, though not all, and I'm not such a fan as to remember them inside out so I was a little hazy on some of the characters and details. If you are like me, then don't fear, you can still enjoy the film perfectly well. If you have had no sort of introduction to the Marvel world or a limited one, then this movie will not be for you as it tells the story on the presumption that you know the Marvel universe that has been established in past movies.
As to the movie itself-it's easily the best Avenger movie and perhaps the best Marvel movie full stop. I was really dubious as to whether the film could manage all the different characters but it did and it made it look effortless. Saying that, some characters obviously got less screen time and development but luckily for me, most of those were my least favourite characters so it didn't concern me. However, if you're a big fan of Black Panther, Captain America, Black Widow and the Winter Solider, to name a few, then you may be a little disappointed. The dialogue was brilliant, the action scenes breathtaking and Thanos makes a great villain (finally we get one that isn't black and white). There were also dark, gut wrenching scenes here and some genuine surprises. A great movie and well worth a watch.
This is an amazing film, with an amazing story, awesome fight scenes, and so much more!
Absolutely, Amazing! Nothing else to say.
